channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 韩国表示，将采取措施吊销罢工实习医生的执照，这些医生在医疗培训改革的对峙中违抗命令，要求返回工作岗位。
item.description:
South Korea says it will take steps to suspend the licences of striking trainee doctors who have defied orders to return to work in a standoff over medical training reforms.https://t.co/8GAzJHcJDm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 视频：一个致力于寻找智利 1973-1990 年独裁统治期间被非法收养和带到国外的儿童的非政府组织将利用人工智能寻找这些儿童。
item.description:
VIDEO: An NGO dedicated to finding children illegally adopted and taken abroad during Chile's 1973-1990 dictatorship will search for them using artificial intelligence. pic.twitter.com/Lw63PqXKs7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 法国立法者预计将于周一将堕胎权写入国家宪法，这在全球尚属首次，获得了绝大多数公众的支持。
item.description:
French lawmakers are expected on Monday to anchor the right to abortion in the country's constitution, a global first that has garnered overwhelming public support.https://t.co/Ul9ZgjQGAb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 视频：10 年前神秘失踪的马来西亚航空公司客机上的乘客亲属周日聚集在一起举行悼念活动，他们呼吁进行新的搜寻。
item.description:
VIDEO: Relatives of passengers on a Malaysia Airlines plane that mysteriously vanished 10 years ago gathered on Sunday for a memorial as they called for a new search. pic.twitter.com/F8S8LR5WTN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 视频：海地政府宣布进入紧急状态并实行夜间宵禁，以便在首都主要监狱发生致命的帮派袭击并导致数千名囚犯越狱后重新控制国家。
item.description:
VIDEO: Haiti's government has declared a state of emergency and nighttime curfew in a bid to regain control of the country after a deadly gang assault on the capital's main prison that allowed thousands of inmates to escape.#AFPVertical
🎥 Luckenson Jean pic.twitter.com/pQK8HVVHAB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 视频：在苏格兰偏远小镇坎贝尔敦，一家素食巧克力制作公司正在为奥斯卡颁奖礼的礼品袋提供巧克力。菲奥娜-麦克阿瑟（Fiona McArthur）说，她的巧克力将赠送给今年奥斯卡主要奖项的提名者，这 "令人难以置信"。
item.description:
VIDEO: In the remote Scottish town of Campbeltown, a vegan chocolate-making company is providing chocolates for the Oscars goodie bags.

Fiona McArthur says "it's mindblowing" that her chocolates will be going to the nominees for the main categories at this year's awards. pic.twitter.com/lzXAV1pXkw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: SpaceX 向国际空间站发射新机组人员。
item.description:
SpaceX launches new crew to ISS.
📸@Chandanphoto #AFP pic.twitter.com/ukffttTBZ4

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 4, 2024

item.title: 随着美国竞选活动的展开，有关电子计票系统的阴谋论获得了新的生命力。尽管约有 50 家法院裁定驳回对选举舞弊的指控，但一些选民坚信计票机可以被秘密操纵。
item.description:
Conspiracy theories about electronic vote-counting systems gain new life as US campaign unfolds.

Despite rulings by some 50 courts dismissing charges of electoral fraud, some voters firmly believe vote-counting machines can be manipulated in secrethttps://t.co/a6RtYCD9YU pic.twitter.com/1NDgRE6tnD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 有媒体报道称，泰勒-斯威夫特在新加坡的每场演唱会都能获得数百万美元的资助，但新加坡表示，新加坡为泰勒-斯威夫特在新加坡的演唱会提供的资助远没有外界猜测的那么高。
item.description:
Singapore says its grant to Taylor Swift for her concerts in the city was nowhere near as high as speculated, following media reports that the superstar was offered millions of dollars per gighttps://t.co/1EKJG2MHZV pic.twitter.com/DjhE6Tl6FK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 印度铁道部长表示，造成 14 人死亡的车祸中，火车司机当时正在用手机观看板球比赛。
item.description:
Indian train drivers in crash that killed 14 were watching cricket on a phone, the railways minister says.

The fatal collision in Andhra Pradesh state in October took place as hosts India played England during the one-day World Cuphttps://t.co/BGxMoFjLnn pic.twitter.com/9z70tm1LZ2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #德国工会呼吁汉莎航空地勤人员从周四起举行为期两天的罢工
item.description:
#BREAKING German union calls two-day Lufthansa ground staff strike from Thursday pic.twitter.com/053eP6aMSP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 韩国周一表示，将采取措施吊销罢工见习医生的执照。
item.description:
South Korea said Monday it will take steps to suspend the licences of striking trainee doctors who have defied orders to return to work in a standoff over medical training reformshttps://t.co/sM4GiQaQWG pic.twitter.com/TXom1H7r8t

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: @AFP 的 Vyacheslav Oseledko 拍摄了在吉尔吉斯斯坦 Uch-Emchek 进行中亚传统运动 Kok-Boru（灰狼）或 Buzkashi（抓羊）比赛的骑手。选手们通过将绵羊或山羊的尸体或填充皮扔进...
item.description:
Skin in the game.@AFP’s Vyacheslav Oseledko photographs riders competing in the traditional Central Asian sport of Kok-Boru (Gray Wolf) or Buzkashi (Goat Grabbing) in Uch-Emchek, Kyrgyzstan. Players compete for points by throwing a sheep or goat carcass or stuffed skin into a… pic.twitter.com/iKTnmAl0zm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）敦促加沙立即停火，在巴勒斯坦领土激战正酣之际，加大了对主要盟友以色列的压力。
item.description:
US Vice President Kamala Harris has urged an immediate ceasefire in Gaza, upping the pressure on key ally Israel as heavy fighting rages in the Palestinian territory.

Harris's comments are the most forceful to date by a US administration officialhttps://t.co/UKj7n0WUk6 pic.twitter.com/nnJ0cTZiLd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 一年一度的政协会议在北京拉开帷幕，中国经济备受 "关注"。去年，中国经济增速创下数十年来最低水平，但全国政协发言人刘结一表示，中国政府对经济反弹有 "充分信心"。
item.description:
China's economy of 'great concern' as annual political conclave kicks off in Beijing.

Last year, China posted some of its lowest economic growth in decades, but CPPCC spokesperson Liu Jieyi says Beijing' has "ample confidence" the economy will reboundhttps://t.co/jRCfUczaCf pic.twitter.com/QW2nYts8XB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 三名美国宇航员和一名俄罗斯宇航员于周日晚从佛罗里达起飞，前往国际空间站执行为期六个月的任务。
item.description:
New crew heads to ISS.

Three American astronauts and a Russian cosmonaut blasted off Sunday night from Florida for a six-month mission on the International Space Stationhttps://t.co/paJ5tkD6XR pic.twitter.com/Bm22Zu7krX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 视频：人工智能帮助寻找被非法收养的儿童： 人工智能将帮助寻找被非法收养的儿童。一个致力于寻找智利 1973-1990 年独裁统治期间被非法收养和带到国外的儿童的非政府组织将利用人工智能寻找这些儿童。
item.description:
VIDEO: AI to help in search for children illegally adopted.

An NGO dedicated to finding children illegally adopted and taken abroad during Chile's 1973-1990 dictatorship will search for them using artificial intelligence.

Hijos y Madres del Silencio ('Children and Mothers of… pic.twitter.com/vdrdEkjqCX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: @AFP 的 Thibaud Moritz 拍摄了在法国西南部波尔多举行的 Carnaval Des Deux Rives 期间身着传统非洲主题服装游行的参与者。
item.description:
Parade of colour.@AFP’s Thibaud Moritz photographs participants in traditional African-themed clothing parading through Bordeaux, southwestern France, during the Carnaval Des Deux Rives pic.twitter.com/dszh1cCkO2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 法国立法者预计将于周一将堕胎权写入国家宪法，这在全球尚属首次，获得了绝大多数公众的支持
item.description:
French lawmakers are expected Monday to anchor the right to abortion in the country's constitution, in a global first that has garnered overwhelming public supporthttps://t.co/69rftUVNEe pic.twitter.com/swDC3upikE

item.title: "停止骚扰我们 "菲律宾外长恩里克-马纳洛（Enrique Manalo）告诉 @法新社 ，菲律宾希望和平解决与中国的海洋争端，但他向中国政府传达了一个简单的信息："停止骚扰我们
item.description:
"Stop harassing us"

Philippine foreign minister Enrique Manalo tells @AFP that his country wants to solve maritime disputes with China peacefully -- but delivered a simple message to Beijing: "stop harassing us"https://t.co/d8LdF6rq72 pic.twitter.com/Wp1SORuBs1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 上周末，数百名阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的支持者排队向这位已故的俄罗斯反对党领袖献花和致敬，这是对这位上个月在北极监狱囚禁区去世的反腐运动人士的重要支持。
item.description:
Hundreds of Alexei Navalny supporters queued to lay flowers and pay tribute to the deceased Russian opposition leader over the weekend, in a significant show of support for the anti-corruption campaigner, who died last month in an Arctic prison colony https://t.co/jQE25yrhc2 pic.twitter.com/nzFd39L5em

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 据 @AFP 记者和一个非政府组织报道，黑帮成员袭击了海地首都的主要监狱，引发数千名囚犯越狱，造成至少十几人死亡。
item.description:
At least a dozen people died when gang members attacked the main prison in Haiti's capital, triggering a breakout by several thousand inmates, an @AFP journalist and an NGO reporthttps://t.co/wxJ68JaEZD pic.twitter.com/Z6EAKo2eof

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 厄瓜多尔著名的加拉帕戈斯群岛（Galapagos archipelago）上一座无人居住岛屿上的火山正在喷发熔岩，当局称，这可能会威胁到一系列独特的动物物种。
item.description:
A volcano on an uninhabited island of Ecuador's famous Galapagos archipelago is spewing lava, authorities say, potentially threatening an array of unique animal specieshttps://t.co/Qrv6OwHoP8 pic.twitter.com/zUuBEqBdj5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 随着阿富汗数十年战争的结束，汽车驾驶员们利用新发现的安全优势，让他们的改装汽车在比赛中相互较量，或展示漂移技巧
item.description:
With the end of decades of war in Afghanistan, motorists are taking advantage of newfound security to pit their souped-up cars against each other in races, or show off drifting skills pic.twitter.com/os9AkZJHS0

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 塞浦路斯北部自行宣布分离的国家领导人告诉法新社，除非土族塞人的主权和平等地位得到承认，否则他们不会坐在任何谈判桌前。
item.description:
Turkish Cypriots will not sit at any negotiating table unless their sovereignty and equal status is recognized, the leader of the breakaway, self-declared state in northern Cyprus told AFP https://t.co/z8tqzIlqi7 pic.twitter.com/IUBgtR4dIW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #日本基准日经指数首次突破 40,000 点
item.description:
#BREAKING Japan's benchmark Nikkei index surpasses 40,000 for the first time pic.twitter.com/F5ZhUFLlAS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 高尔夫传奇人物泰格-伍兹将在周一于佛罗里达州朱诺海滩举行的塞米诺尔职业会员锦标赛上开球，这位 15 次大满贯赛冠军将在 2021 年的车祸之后，尝试看看自己是否还能在美巡赛上争夺冠军 #AFPSports
item.description:
Golf legend Tiger Woods will tee it up in Monday's Seminole pro-member tournament in Juno Beach, Florida, as the 15-time major champion tries to find out if he can contend again on the PGA Tour after his 2021 car crash #AFPSports https://t.co/q7GaMpWqgu pic.twitter.com/VY5QtwpkUw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）周日呼吁全世界帮助基辅战胜 "俄罗斯邪恶"，因为敖德萨无人机袭击造成的死亡人数上升到 12 人，其中包括五名儿童。
item.description:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Sunday called for the world to help Kyiv defeat "Russian evil" as the death toll from a drone strike on Odesa rose to 12, including five children https://t.co/b4QmSmJNGF pic.twitter.com/QelJ2E85lw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 一名军方人士及其家人说，马里一名上校在巴马科被捕，他最近出版的书中引用了国际人权组织关于军队虐待平民的报告。
item.description:
A colonel in Mali whose recent book cites international rights organizations' reports on army abuses of civilians has been arrested in Bamako, a military source and his family said https://t.co/19Ov74bNqt pic.twitter.com/49c4TJxbdt

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 英迪拉-特尔古巴耶娃在前夫企图杀害她的事件中幸存下来，她正在为在祖国哈萨克斯坦被承认为受害者而奋斗。
item.description:
After surviving her ex-husband's attempt to kill her, Indira Tergeubayeva is fighting to be recognized as a victim in her native Kazakhstan.

Her experience is not unique in the country, where domestic violence is not included in the criminal code https://t.co/sGLero9dcW pic.twitter.com/Y7InTSJS1I

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024
